Level.messageText: Here I introduced you to the dynamics of tracing resource paths to guide the Terrachanics linking system. Ah, the good old days!
Level.objectiveText: Help NukeTech expand their workforce to provide power to more areas.

Level.messageText: Wonderful! You are a natural! The world is rarely so linear, though, so let's see if you can handle some advanced lessons.
Level.objectiveText: Help Alma City solve their gas shortage problem.

Level.messageText: How does it feel to be a part of history? Let's make things more interesting this time...
Level.objectiveText: Mobilize area professionals to help repair the Hydrolyss Dam.

Level.messageText: Now you're getting it... but we're just getting started. Let's see how clever you really are...
Level.objectiveText: Help Derptronics complete their research in Liquid Metal Battery technology before their funding is cut.

Level.messageText: Helena Edison, ECRB Executive Director. Dr. Fernandez has assured me you can handle sensitive missions. We'll see about that.
Level.objectiveText: Bring the Pygram Nuclear plant online.

Level.messageText: Congratulations! Edison spoke very highly of you. In her own way. The subtext was clearly there. Anyway, onward and upward!
Level.objectiveText: Direct gas and utility modernizations in Blackstone.

Level.messageText: Silver is more that beautiful - it is a tool to bend electricity to our will! Within a conductor's intricate patterns is the true beauty of science!
Level.objectiveText: Davincraft Aeronautics needs advanced silver printing technology for their low-weight prototype aircraft.

Level.messageText: This is the time I blew your mind with my awesome Hyperfabricator invention!
Level.objectiveText: Help Nava Automotive complete their ethanol fuel conversion research.

Level.messageText: Good, Hyperfab didn’t overheat this time. Not like it does... most of the time. Anyway! What do you say we help some folks with their drill?
Level.objectiveText: Optimize oil production by reusing carbon emissions from oil drilling.

Level.messageText: Still only reading 89% efficiency on this thing. I can’t get a Nobel Prize for that! Help me out, man. Get those fishies happy and the scientific community happier.
Level.objectiveText: Install Fish-Friendly Turbine technology to prevent the Hydroelectric Dam from disrupting local fishing industry.

Level.messageText: Brenton’s got it rough this year. Record heat is stalling their car production factory, on top of AC costs. Not for long with this baby!
Level.objectiveText: Oversee implementation of a Mounted Photovoltaic Collector module.

Level.messageText: A city near a volcano… yeah, no thanks. But hey, if the people of Stark are cool with it, we can work magic beneath their feet.
Level.objectiveText: Help Stark support its growing population by implementing geothermal power.

Level.messageText: Anyone ever tell you that you were full of hot air? Well after today, you should take it as a compliment.
Level.objectiveText: Help Derptronics bring their Air-Powered Cars to market.

Level.messageText: The time we got ourselves acquainted. Didn't think much of you at the time, to be honest.
Level.objectiveText: Help recruit scientists to develop cutting edge hydrogen storage technology.

Level.messageText: Gil Gas ain't lookin' so good. I'll handle that while you hand off those plug thingies to the businessy folks in Hillbrad Tower.
Level.objectiveText: Provide energy monitoring plugs to Hilbrad Tower to help cut their energy costs.

Level.messageText: No fuel for the planes? We’ll have none of that! Got the annual Robotic Deathtrap convention coming up in a month. No way I’m missing it this year!
Level.objectiveText: Repair supply lines to bring fuel back to the Duncan Airport.

Level.messageText: Oh boy. Derptronics sure picked a great place to make a solar factory. They got the tech, but their neighbors could use some straightening out. Let's get to it.
Level.objectiveText: Help Derptronics develop efficient polymer solar cell technology to optimize their solar panels.

Level.messageText: Finally Hilbert is looking to refurbish their decommissioned oil rig into a tidal power engine. That kind of project gives me warm fuzzy feelings at night.
Level.objectiveText: Convert the Hilbert coastal oil drill into a tidal power station.

Level.messageText: Never throw things away. That was Aunt Irma’s motto. Sure, they called her a hoarder, but I say she was a scientific genius ahead of her time.
Level.objectiveText: Develop supply lines to bring the JunkCo waste conversion facility online.

Level.messageText: An introduction to how Agents work
Level.objectiveText: The first day of the rest of your life - the day I became your esteemed mentor and role model.

Level.messageText: I hear the tech on this one involves using garbage to run your car. Just keep that stuff away from my Hummer and we'll all be better off.
Level.objectiveText: Escort scientists to help implement a Biodiesel fueling station.

Level.messageText: Way to be my eyes in the skies there, buddy! Not a fan of multi-tasking myself, but I hear CHP is going to be huge in heating and powering factories.
Level.objectiveText: Implement a Combined Heat and Power System into the new Davincraft aeronautics factory.

Level.messageText: Auton sounds like a great place to get a tan, eh? Not if its from sitting at your desk at work. These guys need some stylish TMSM tech to give them some extra shade!
Level.objectiveText: Upgrade Auton’s tallest office building to use transition metal switchable mirrors to cut AC costs.

Level.messageText: Never been a fan of science. Don't trust it. But I do share a scientist's passion for breathing. Maybe we aren't so different after all?
Level.objectiveText: Help Derptronics install a new Volatile Organic Compound filtration system to cut air filtration costs.

Level.messageText: Just one more job and we’ll be getting you a sweet suit like mine. Let's see you earn those stars!
Level.objectiveText: Mobilize local scientists to assist in bringing the latest high-volume power plant online.

Level.messageText: Aw man, this is going to be a bit of a haul. Gotta get way the heck across town to get that Hydro plant running. Oh well, that refinery isn’t going to fix itself.
Level.objectiveText: Restore power to the Yormund Refinery.

Level.messageText: Ah ha! Just the thing to improve the power conversion of the Hyperfabricator. Hilbert is smart to go with silicon carbide thyristors.
Level.objectiveText: Implement silicon carbide thyristors into inner Braklin’s residential district.

Level.messageText: I’ve been kicking around this idea of spray-on solar panels for years… but now Hilbert has gone and made it first! Ugh, always beating me to the punch!
Level.objectiveText: Help the Hilbert microsolar lab complete their newest factory.

Level.messageText: How exciting! All of the Terrachanics components are fully operational and in your capable hands. I couldn’t be prouder!
Level.objectiveText: Reallocate resources to support the recently built electronics factory in Jaynestown.

Level.messageText: Back in the old days it took days to tear apart a solar panel system to install upgrades, but now we can do it without even a scratch!
Level.objectiveText: Direct the installation of Non-Invasive Energy Meters to monitor Southtown's solar array efficiency.

Level.messageText: Billy City is expecting a big oil shipment. Or vats of Swiss Chocolate... can't remember, exactly. As long as we don't get the barrels mixed up it's all good.
Level.objectiveText: Help Billy City Airport trade organic produce for petroleum.

Level.messageText: This Organic Flash Cycle system recycles waste heat to make solar and geothermal systems way more efficient. Dude... 3D printers powered by lava!
Level.objectiveText: Install an Organic Flash Cycle system into Derptronics Tower to optimize their building-mounted solar array.

Level.messageText: Did I ever mention I had a twin? She’s from a different department, but she can help out in a pinch. Gonna need her for this next one for sure.
Level.objectiveText: Convert the old Sanspoof textile mill into an alternative energy Lab.

Level.messageText: I figured out the problem - conventional batteries! This algae bio-reactor tech could boost the Hyperfabricators speed by 20%!
Level.objectiveText: Help mount Algae-based bioreactor panels to Imperial Apartments to make them energy independent.

Level.messageText: Pollution out here does a number on the residents. Air filtration systems take a big cut out of Derptronics’ profits. With this RIVEC setup we can cut costs nearly in half!
Level.objectiveText: Upgrade Wild Tower’s ventilation to use a Residential Integrated Ventilation Controller.

Level.messageText: Man... every time I see an electric car, I get super jealous! Those things are like spaceships... with wheels. Next paycheck, my friend... ramen for a few months will be totally worth it!
Level.objectiveText: Direct the installation of an Electric Car Charging Station for Gaseus Clay Station.

Level.messageText: I always wanted a cabin in the middle of nowhere. A nice break away from my adoring fans. Don’t give me that look, they are coming. Just you wait!
Level.objectiveText: Provide resources to Pygram to expand their power line coverage.

Level.messageText: The future is now, my friend! Soon you’ll see smart grids from coast to coast, but everything has to start somewhere.
Level.objectiveText: Help mobilize local scientists and engineers to help implement a large-scale smart grid.

Level.messageText: Ah ha! I caught 'em this time! Our little saboteurs left some breadcrumbs for us. Though… I did forget to bring Nuka Nuclear online… you should get on that.
Level.objectiveText: Gather resources to bring the Nuka Nuclear plant online.

Level.messageText: Hackers eh? Nothing we can't handle! Let's see if getting this electrofuel distribution up will bait them out of hiding.
Level.objectiveText: Upgrade the Gaseous Clay fuel depot to use electrofuels to cut fuel costs for truckers.

Level.messageText: Winter is coming! In about 5 months. But hey, the winters can be rough in New Vermachusetts, but with a forecasting grid their power systems can take it.
Level.objectiveText: Implement a Forecasting Grid system to residential centers to adjust power distribution to weather conditions.

Level.messageText: Not my private jet! I pay good money to rent- err… own that thing! I’ll do some snooping while you get Air Lions Airlines the tech for solar powered planes.
Level.objectiveText: Allocate resources to support prototype flights of new solar powered planes.

Level.messageText: We have reason to believe your Secondary Objectives may contain clues to the culprits behind the cyber attacks. Check them out.
Level.objectiveText: Help get Bill Bowes’ Lab equipment company funding for their energy efficient fume hoods.

Level.messageText: Not gonna lie, this ones a doozy. Hightown needs a lot of help to get their Hydrogen storage research completed, but I think you can handle it. Get it done!
Level.objectiveText: Reroute energy sources to ensure the Abco factory can complete its Hydrogen Storage research.

Level.messageText: Lower costs, less pollution... what more could you want out of a heating/AC system? Nobody’s sabotaging this baby on my watch!
Level.objectiveText: Install a Super Energy Saver Heat pump system to optimize air conditioning and heating systems in Lictor City.

Level.messageText: Counter-espionage is all about getting into the other guy’s head. Mind games. I figure here they are trying to hit us with a diversion on the refinery, but I know their game!
Level.objectiveText: Assist with critical refinery maintenance and deliver Dr. Watson to the Hilbert solar lab.

Level.messageText: It is important not just to look at the mountaintop, but the sludge in the river beneath it! With a few upgrades we can get the waste treatment plant working at peak efficiency.
Level.objectiveText: Install Heat Transfer Interfaces to help reduce costs at the waste treatment plant.

Level.messageText: Me and Nancy got a job, eh? Move on over for the dream team! We got some special schematics ready for those Hilbert eggheads.
Level.objectiveText: Provide blueprints for installing a Modular Nuclear Reactor.

Level.messageText: ShockJock Fabrication is at it again! They got themselves as nice Gallium Nitride Crystal growth system for high-efficiency transistors. Nancy has all the fun!
Level.objectiveText: Help repair the power grid to allow ShockJock Frabrication to complete their Gallium Nitride Crystal Growth research.

Level.messageText: Last blast, kiddo. Just one more job and we’ll get to the bottom of this. We’re going to upgrade one of the ECRB’s own labs with enhanced cyber security to try to catch them in the act.
Level.objectiveText: Upgrade cyber security of the local smartgrid system as a countermeasure against cyber attacks.
